languages.text: "Твое великодушие, элантах... позорит меня и в то же время возвеличивает. Ибо его сияние возносит мою душу над грязью собственных деяний" {n}, — ответ, благодарный и мягкий, едва слышен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Твое великодушие, элантах... позорит меня и в то же время возвеличивает. Ибо его сияние возносит мою душу над грязью собственных деяний" {n}, — листвой на ветру шелестит тихий ответ, благодарный и мягкий.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, your generosity... both shames and sublimes me. For its light carries my soul over the grime of my own deeds." {n}Her reply, grateful and soft, is barely audible.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Твое великодушие, элантах... позорит меня и в то же время возвеличивает. Ибо его сияние возносит мою душу над грязью собственных деяний" {n}, — ответ, благодарный и мягкий, едва слышен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, your generosity... both shames and sublimes me. For its light carries my soul over the grime of my own deeds." {n}Her reply, grateful and soft, is akin to the quiet rustling of leaves in the wind.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, your generosity... both shames and sublimes me. For its light carries my soul over the grime of my own deeds." {n}Her reply, grateful and soft, is akin to the quiet rustling of leaves in the wind.{/n}

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, your generosity... both shames and sublimes me. For its light carries my soul over the grime of my own deeds." {n}Her reply, grateful and soft, is barely audible.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, your generosity... both shames and sublimes me. For its light carries my soul over the grime of my own deeds." {n}Her reply, grateful and soft, is barely audible.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, your generosity... both shames and sublimes me. For its light carries my soul over the grime of my own deeds." {n}Her reply, grateful and soft, is barely audible.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、あなたの寛大さは…我を辱め、そして高める。その光は、我自身の行いの汚れの上に我の魂を運んでくれるから」{n}彼女の返事は、感謝に満ちた柔らかなもので、かろうじて聞き取れる程度だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your generosity... both shames and sublimes me. For its light carries my soul over the grime of my own deeds." {n}Her reply, grateful and soft, is barely audible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、あなたの寛大さは…我を辱め、そして高める。その光は、我自身の行いの汚れの上に我の魂を運んでくれるから」{n}彼女の返事は、感謝に満ちた柔らかなもので、かろうじて聞き取れる程度だ。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “外界人，你的慷慨……既让我羞愧不已，又让我变得更加纯洁。它的光芒照耀着我的灵魂，让我摆脱了我自己的污点。”{n}她的回答既感激、又温柔，声音很轻，几乎难以听清。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your generosity... both shames and sublimes me. For its light carries my soul over the grime of my own deeds." {n}Her reply, grateful and soft, is barely audible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “外界人，你的慷慨……既让我羞愧不已，又让我变得更加纯洁。它的光芒照耀着我的灵魂，让我摆脱了我自己的污点。”{n}她的回答既感激、又温柔，就像风中树叶的沙沙声一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Elantach, tu generosidad... me avergüenza y me ennoblece, pues su luz hace que mi alma recorra una vez más la perversión de mis propios actos». {n}Su respuesta, agradecida y suave, es prácticamente inaudible.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your generosity... both shames and sublimes me. For its light carries my soul over the grime of my own deeds." {n}Her reply, grateful and soft, is barely audible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Elantach, tu generosidad... me avergüenza y me ennoblece, pues su luz hace que mi alma recorra una vez más la perversión de mis propios actos». {n}Su respuesta, agradecida y suave, es como el susurro sutil de las hojas al viento.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, Eure Großzügigkeit ... beschämt und erhöht mich. Denn Ihr Licht trägt meine Seele über den Schmutz meiner eigenen Taten." {n}Ihre Antwort, dankbar und sanft, ist kaum hörbar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your generosity... both shames and sublimes me. For its light carries my soul over the grime of my own deeds." {n}Her reply, grateful and soft, is barely audible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, Eure Großzügigkeit ... beschämt und erhöht mich. Denn Ihr Licht trägt meine Seele über den Schmutz meiner eigenen Taten." {n}Ihre Antwort, dankbar und sanft, gleicht dem leisen Rascheln von Blättern im Wind.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Elantach, votre générosité... me couvre de honte tout en me transcendant, car sa lumière transporte mon âme malgré la souillure de mes propres péchés. » {n}Sa réponse, toute en douceur et en reconnaissance, est à peine audible.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your generosity... both shames and sublimes me. For its light carries my soul over the grime of my own deeds." {n}Her reply, grateful and soft, is barely audible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Elantach, votre générosité... me couvre de honte tout en me transcendant, car sa lumière transporte mon âme malgré la souillure de mes propres péchés. » {n}Sa réponse, douce et pleine de reconnaissance, est aussi discrète que le bruissement des feuilles qui volent au vent.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, gösterdiğin bu büyüklük... Beni hem mahcup ediyor hem de yüceltiyor. Büyüklüğünün ışığında ruhum, kendi yaptıklarımın lekesinden temizleniyor." {n}Yrliet'in minnettar ve uysal cevabı, zar zor duyuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your generosity... both shames and sublimes me. For its light carries my soul over the grime of my own deeds." {n}Her reply, grateful and soft, is barely audible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, gösterdiğin bu büyüklük... Beni hem mahcup düşürüyor hem de yüceltiyor. Büyüklüğünün ışığında ruhum, kendi yaptıklarımın lekesinden temizleniyor." {n}Yrliet'in minnettar ve uysal cevabı zar zor duyuluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
